metadata.title: Tarevity - Streamline Your Productivity with Smart Task Management
metadata.description: Transform how you organize daily work with Tarevity's intuitive task management.

structuredData.description: A modern task management application that helps professionals organize their work and increase productivity.

hero.title: Manage your tasks efficiently
hero.description: Organize your tasks, set priorities, and never forget important deadlines again. A simple and efficient way to increase your productivity.

features.heading: Features
features.subheading: Everything you need to stay organized

feature1.title: Simple task management
feature1.description: Add, edit, and mark tasks as completed with ease. Intuitive and user-friendly interface.

feature2.title: Never miss a deadline
feature2.description: Set due dates for your tasks and stay in control of your commitments.

feature3.title: Secure and private
feature3.description: Your tasks are stored securely. Login with GitHub and Google for greater convenience.

feature4.title: Access from anywhere
feature4.description: Responsive design that works on all devices. Your tasks are always within reach.
